Itemized Passive Description:
*Activates the Entrance Animation when all allies are
Extreme Class characters*
- {passiveImg:once}Extreme Class allies' chance of performing
a critical hit 20%{passiveImg:up_g} and randomly changes TEQ or AGL
Ki Spheres to Rainbow Ki Spheres for 1 turn
- {passiveImg:once}Launches an additional Super Attack and
Extreme Class allies' Ki +2 and ATK 70%{passiveImg:up_g} for 4 turns
*Basic effect(s)*
- Ki +3 and ATK & DEF 300%{passiveImg:up_g}
- Receives an additional Ki +1 per Ki Sphere obtained
- Damage reduction rate 50%{passiveImg:up_g}
- Randomly changes PHY or INT Ki Spheres to
Rainbow Ki Spheres
*With a Rainbow Ki Sphere obtained*
- Extreme Class allies' DEF 70%{passiveImg:up_g}, plus an additional
damage reduction rate 10%{passiveImg:up_g} for characters who also
belong to the "GT Bosses" Category, for 2 turns
*When attacking*
- ATK 150%{passiveImg:up_g}
*When Ki is 18 or more*
- ATK 150%{passiveImg:up_g} when attacking
- DEF 150%{passiveImg:up_g} when receiving an attack
*When attacking with 24 Ki*
- Performs a critical hit
*When receiving an Unarmed Super Attack*
- Great chance of nullifying it and countering with
tremendous power
- Nullifies it and counters with tremendous power
when HP is 70% or less
*After performing 5 or more attacks in battle*
- {passiveImg:forever}Extreme Class allies' Ki +2 and chance of
performing a critical hit 20%{passiveImg:up_g}
- {passiveImg:forever}Randomly changes TEQ or AGL Ki Spheres
to Rainbow Ki Spheres starting from the character's
next attacking turn

7730.superDescription:
Raises DEF for 1 turn, 
causes colossal damage to enemy 
and greatly lowers ATK & DEF

SpecialBonus.Description: Super Attack power will be increased even more!
Super Attack power will be increased even more!

Active Skill.Name: Devastating Minus Energy
Active Skill.Effect Description:
Creates the Domain 
"Earth Shrouded in Minus Energy" 
for 3 turns
Active Skill.Condition Description:
Can be activated when there is another 
"Inhuman Deeds", "Power Absorption" or 
"GT Bosses" Category ally attacking in the 
same turn, or after the character performs 
5 or more attacks in battle (once only)
